Uses of Class
xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.TId

  • Packages that use TId 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
    Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.

    • Uses of TId in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager that return TId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TId TIdManager.query(Object id)
      Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer.
      TId MapTIdManager.query(Object id)
      Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer.
      TId IdentityTIdManager.query(Object id)
      Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer (here, the id has to be a tuple identifyer and the reference to the same object is returned ==> identity).
      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager with parameters of type TId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object TIdManager.insert(TId tid)
      Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer.
      Object MapTIdManager.insert(TId tid)
      Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer.
      Object IdentityTIdManager.insert(TId tid)
      Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer.
      void TIdManager.update(Object id, TId newTId)
      Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
      void MapTIdManager.update(Object id, TId newTId)
      Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
      void IdentityTIdManager.update(Object id, TId newTId)
      Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
      void RecordManager.PageInformation.updateReserveInformation(TId tid, short numberOfRecordsAdded, int numberOfBytesUsedByRecordsAdded, short numberOfLinkRecordsAdded)
      If a reservation/insert/update is made directly on the Page object, then this reservation has to be send to the PageInformation object to update its internal structures (number of records, length of all records, min/max record numbers).
